entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the one who is leaking a silvery blue substance from his mouth, ears, and eyes. This is described in the text as 'Something more than blood was leaking from Snape'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry knows what the silvery blue substance is but does not know what to do. He is also described as having his shaking hand thrust into by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione conjures a flask from thin air and thrusts it into Harry's shaking hand. This shows that she is trying to help Harry deal with the situation.

entities.name: snape's robes
entities.description: Snape has a grip on Harry's robes, which slackens when he looks as though there is no blood left in him.

relationships.description: Harry knows what the silvery blue substance is, but does not know what to do. This is described in the text as 'Harry knew what it was, but did not know what to do'.
Hermione conjures a flask from thin air and thrusts it into Harry's shaking hand. This shows that she is trying to help Harry deal with the situation.
Snape has a grip on Harry's robes, which slackens when he looks as though there is no blood left in him.
